name: SearchConversations
description:
Search conversations by specific attributes.

This tool allows users to search for conversations in Intercom by defining specific attributes and filters. Use operators like AND/OR to refine your search, controlling the number of results with pagination. Call this tool when you need specific conversation details filtered by attributes such as id, created date, or author info.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the Intercom API to use. Choose from available versions like '1.0', '2.0', etc.

parameters.name: search_criteria
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying search filters such as attributes, operators, and pagination settings.

per_page.description: The number of results to fetch per page.

starting_after.description: The cursor to use in the next request to get the next page of results.
